Tennessee dropped from No PERIOD  to No PERIOD  in this weeks AP Poll after a semifinal exit in the SEC Tournament PERIOD

The Lady Vols picked up a win in the quarterfinal against Alabama but that would be their only win of the weekend as Kentucky defeated the Lady Vols in the semifinals on its way to a championship PERIOD

The Wildcats are one of the hottest teams in college basketball right now upsetting No PERIOD  LSU Tennessee and No PERIOD  Kentucky in the SEC Tournament PERIOD Kentuckys performance in the tournament gave the Wildcats a huge jump in the polls moving from unranked to No PERIOD  PERIOD Kentucky has now won  games in a row PERIOD

Despite being upset by Kentucky South Carolina remains at No PERIOD  in this weeks AP Poll PERIOD The Gamecocks have sat at No PERIOD  for the entirety of the season now PERIOD

Like Tennessee LSUs loss to Kentucky sent the Tigers down in the rankings falling three spots to No PERIOD  PERIOD

In ESPNs most recent Bracketology nine SEC teams appeared getting bids to the tournament the most of any conference PERIOD

South Carolina comes in as the highest seeded SEC team as a No PERIOD  seed followed by LSU as a No PERIOD  Tennessee as a No PERIOD  Ole Miss as a No PERIOD  Florida and Kentucky as No PERIOD  seeds Arkansas as a No PERIOD  and Missouri as a No PERIOD  PERIOD

Tennessee has a projected first round matchup with Charlotte in Knoxville PERIOD Some notable opponents in Tennessees bracket pool are NC State and Iowa State PERIOD

The Lady Vols will find out their tournament destiny on Sunday during the selection show PERIOD
